info.title: tables
info.description: Manage data the way you need it.

post.summary: Create a new table and return it

get.summary: Get all views for a table

post.summary: Create a new view for a table

parameters.name: tableId
parameters.description: Table ID that will hold the view

put.summary: Update a view via key-value sets

permissionType.description: Permission type that should be changed

get.summary: Get all shares for a view Will be empty if view does not exist
Get all shares for a table Will be empty if table does not exist

post.summary: Create a share for a table

permissionRead.description: Permission if receiver can read data

permissionCreate.description: Permission if receiver can create data

permissionUpdate.description: Permission if receiver can update data

permissionDelete.description: Permission if receiver can delete data

permissionManage.description: Permission if receiver can manage table

post.summary: Create a new share

permissionRead.description: Permission if receiver can read data

permissionCreate.description: Permission if receiver can create data

permissionUpdate.description: Permission if receiver can update data

permissionDelete.description: Permission if receiver can delete data

permissionManage.description: Permission if receiver can manage node

displayMode.description: context shares only, whether it should appear in nav bar. 0: no, 1: recipients, 2: all (default). Cf. Application::NAV_ENTRY_MODE_*.

put.summary: Updates the display mode of a context share

displayMode.description: The new value for the display mode of the nav bar icon. 0: hidden, 1: visible for recipients, 2: visible for all

target.description: "default" to set the default, "self" to set an override for the authenticated user

get.summary: Get all columns for a table or a underlying view Return an empty array if no columns were found

post.summary: Create a new column for a table

numberPrefix.description: Prefix if the column is a number field

numberSuffix.description: Suffix if the column is a number field

numberDefault.description: Default number, if column is a number

numberMin.description: Min value, if column is a number

numberMax.description: Max number, if column is a number

numberDecimals.description: Number of decimals, if column is a number

textDefault.description: Default text, if column is a text

textAllowedPattern.description: Allowed pattern (regex) for text columns (not yet implemented)

textMaxLength.description: Max length, if column is a text

selectionOptions.description: Options for a selection (json array{id: int, label: string})

selectionDefault.description: Default option IDs for a selection (json list<int>)

datetimeDefault.description: Default value, if column is datetime

usergroupDefault.description: Default value, if column is usergroup

usergroupMultipleItems.description: Can select multiple users or/and groups, if column is usergroup

usergroupSelectUsers.description: Can select users, if column type is usergroup

usergroupSelectGroups.description: Can select groups, if column type is usergroup

usergroupSelectTeams.description: Can select teams, if column type is usergroup

usergroupShowUserStatus.description: Whether to show the user's status, if column type is usergroup

selectedViewIds.description: View IDs where this column should be added to be presented

selectionOptions.description: Json array{id: int, label: string} with options that can be selected, eg [{"id": 1, "label": "first"},{"id": 2, "label": "second"}]

selectionDefault.description: Json int|list<int> for default selected option(s), eg 5 or ["1", "8"]

parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

post.summary: [api v2] Create new datetime column
post.description: Specify a subtype to use any special datetime column

datetimeDefault.description: For a subtype 'date' you can set 'today'. For a main type or subtype 'time' you can set to 'now'.

selectedViewIds.description: View IDs where this columns should be added

baseNodeType.description: Context type of the column creation

parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

post.summary: [api v2] Create new usergroup column

usergroupDefault.description: Json array{id: string, type: int}, eg [{"id": "admin", "type": 0}, {"id": "user1", "type": 0}]

usergroupMultipleItems.description: Whether you can select multiple users or/and groups

showUserStatus.description: Whether to show the user's status

selectedViewIds.description: View IDs where this columns should be added

baseNodeType.description: Context type of the column creation

nodes.description: optional nodes to be connected to this context

parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

404.description: context not found or not available anymore

put.summary: [api v2] Update an existing context and return it

name.description: provide this parameter to set a new name

iconName.description: provide this parameter to set a new icon

description.description: provide this parameter to set a new description

nodes.description: provide this parameter to set a new list of nodes.

parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

data.description: An array containing the column identifiers and their values

parameters.description: Indicates whether to create a row on a table or view

parameters.description: The identifier of the targeted table or view
